New preset pixel texture pack
Electricity and many new blocks to create complex mechanisms
Spawners, dynamite, fireworks, doors, and many other blocks can be activated with electricity
New transport aircraft
Stick and wall clock block
Musical blocks
Painting amber blocks
The grass grows automatically
The character can climb chains and vines
Cobweb, swamp, and lava slows down the player
Rotation of triangular blocks and hatches
UI improvements
Improved weather and fog performance
New more realistic sky
Coloring the sky in different colors when summoning magical creatures
Skull block activation toggles weather
Knockback effect when taking damage
Improved some digging and block setting mechanics
Fixed wheat work
The hoe now turns grass to earth
Blocks destroyed by explosion now drop loot and activate physics
Rockets destroy blocks
Particles of lights on lava
Ash effect in hell
New achievements and mysteries
Reconstruction of buildings
New hidden chests
Many bug fixes and improvements
